message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know you value this money, but time is of the essence for both of us.  This offer benefits us both.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more equitable split that acknowledges the time pressure we both face.
Bob, I understand your desire for a more even split, but remember that the clock is ticking, especially for you. This offer is a good compromise considering the time pressure.
Alice, this is a final offer.  We both lose with each passing round, but the devaluation impacts me more.  I'm being realistic, but firm. This benefits us both.
